title: Sound On: Sen. Tina Smith, Crypto Amendment
itunes:title: Sound On: Sen. Tina Smith, Crypto Amendment
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Minnesota Senator Tina Smith, Bloomberg's Joe Weisenthal, and Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
